      Deletes previously opened pending order.

      The main function used to open a position or place a pending order.
      int MT4.orderSend(String symbol, TradeOperation cmd, double volume, double price, int slippage, double stoploss, double takeprofit, String comment, int magic, Date expiration, long arrowColor)
      Deprecated. 
      - ticket's data type should be 'long', please use orderSend() method instead.
